audioText: Cette famille pauvre a besoin d'aide pour payer le loyer ce mois-ci.
question: What does the text say about the family?
options: This poor family needs help paying rent this month
This wealthy family is helping others pay rent
This family is poor but refuses help with rent
This family has poor credit but can afford rent
explanation: The text states 'Cette famille pauvre a besoin d'aide pour payer le loyer ce mois-ci' - This poor family needs help paying rent this month. 'Pauvre' means 'poor' (financially disadvantaged).
